title: O
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''o''' will initiate the [[auto-explore]] function.
*Pressing '''O''' is the command to open a [[door]] (you may also just move on the door's tile).
*Pressing '''ctrl-O''' brings up the Dungeon Overview and Level Annotations menu.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''o''' represents an [[List of orcs | orc]]-type monster.
*'''O''' represents an [[ogre]]-type monster.
